_88commonProperties.description: The common properties for all the logs

___location.description: The location of the resource emitting the log.

___durationMs.description: The duration of the operation in milliseconds.

___identity.description: The identity that generated the log.

___claims.description: The claims used to perform the operation.

___time.description: The timestamp (in UTC) of the log.

___correlationId.description: The correlation id of the log used to group together a set of related logs.

___resultSignature.description: The sub status of the operation.
